name: David Ramirez
text: Have you tried Terraria? It feels like a sandbox version of Zelda, except a side-scroller instead of top-down/ 3-quarters. Thank you internet wikis, it would take 10,000 years for me to figure out the tricks if I couldn't look them up. The only downside is the almost total absence of story  =P    I'll definitely get their sci-fi version when it comes out.
